conversations.content:
My family and my cousin's family are planning to visit Los Angeles for 3 days. We want to rent two cars for 3 days.
Can you find me the car rental companies which rent electric cars? Recommend me the car rental company with the best rating.
For my cousin's family, recommend the top-rated car rental company that have SUVs available.
Tell me the two car rental company names and their ratings, and how much it costs for 3 days for each of them.

(function_thought)
The user is looking for car rental companies in Los Angeles, specifically those that offer electric cars and those that provide SUVs. The goal is to find two rental companies: one with the best rating for electric cars and another for SUVs, along with their ratings and rental costs for three days. 

To achieve this, I will first gather all car rental companies in Los Angeles, then inquire about the types of cars they offer, specifically focusing on electric cars and SUVs. After determining the companies, I will check their ratings and pricing for a rental period of three days. I will follow the established function trajectory to execute this task effectively.
</function_thought>

(function_call)
[get_all_car_rental_companies_in_city(city="Los Angeles")]
</function_call>
